title: (x) looking for gothic logo font from the Daily Mail (UK newspaper) or appoximation - various suggestions {Chris C, Richard G}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_6055.png)

the single storey 'a' and backwards-swooping 'y' tail are unusual, I think

anyone?
author: RJG123

comments.content: It's digitised from hand-lettered source. Been cleaned up a few times over the years but there's no exact font match I'm afraid. [Fette Fraktur](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133236/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-fraktur/fette-fraktur/) is in the same vein...
went for [english towne](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133236/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/700) in the end, thanks
